inclusion.criterion: treated for SCD at a RSCCA participating in the study
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: PCP sent him to the emergency department

inclusion.criterion: telephone interview with the patient suited to the child's, adolescent's or young adult's age, maturity and comprehension skills
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subject treated for SCD at a RSCCA participating in the study regardless of the duration of the illness
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: PCP sent him to the emergency department

exclusion.criterion: subject not having the general aptitude to participate in the study assessment
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient is afebrile within the normal blood pressure. No splenomegaly was detected

notes: Patient has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood and severe pain in his lower back that radiated to both thighs scored 9 out of 10.
